DOC.brief_summary: Randomized, single-blind trial in which one group of patients will be operated with a "Mid-Vastus approach" of the knee joint and the other group will undergo knee surgery with a "Sub-Vastus approach".
DOC.brief_title: Sub-Vastus Versus Mid-Vastus Arthrotomy for Total Knee Arthroplasty: a Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: patients diagnosed with osteoarthrosis of the knee patients must be in good general health condition patients with morbid obesity (BMI >45) patients with history of knee surgery, infection or inflammatory disease of the knee joint or large cartilage lesion
